item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Jordan Castillo Price
item.description: "I'd blow someone for a valium," I said in Jacob's ear. "Maybe he's got one... but try offering a hand-job first so you retain some leverage." -- Jordan Castillo Price

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Five exclamation marks, the sure sign of an insane mind." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Charlie Huston
item.description: "One day, when I am a braver man, I will tell her these things, and then I will look her in the eye tell her I love her and ask her to be only mine. But until that day, we're just friends." -- Charlie Huston

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Linda Howard
item.description: "She should have remembered her past experiences in the relationship wars and not let herself get so excited. Evidently her hormones had overruled her common sense and she had become drunk on ovarian wine, the most potent, sanity- destroying substance in the universe." -- Linda Howard

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Linda Howard
item.description: "Do you want to know why men name their penis? So the most important decisions in their life aren't made by a stranger." -- Linda Howard

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "I understood that as much as I had resisted the outside, as much as I had constricted my life, as much as I had closed and narrowed the channels into me, there were still many takers for the quiet heart." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Robert Jordan
item.description: "Almost dead yesterday, maybe dead tomorrow, but alive, gloriously alive, today. -- Mat Cauthon" -- Robert Jordan

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "As Qhuinn looked at his best friend's handsome face, he felt as if he'd never not known that red hair, those blue eyes, those lips, that jaw. And it was because of their long history that he searched for something to say, something that would get them back to where they had been. All that came to him was . . . I miss you. I miss you so fucking bad it hurts, but I don't know how to find you even though you're right in front of me." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "I think we need to have a little talk, woman to skank." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Jeaniene frost
item.description: "Why don't I just give you a pair of my panties to hang around your neck? Then whenever you feel jealous, you can wave them at whoever's pissing you off." -- Jeaniene frost

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "You realise you’re going to owe me dinner after this, right?” “How does McDonald’s sound?” “Inadequate." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "Excuse me, your attention please.” He waited until the whole floor had stopped what it was doing and turned to face him. For a split second his impulse control kicked in, but by then his mouth was fully engaged. “For the record, Claire Marsden and I are not having sex." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "I have sex," Grace shrugged. I meant with a man," Claudia said dryly. Now why would I ruin something so good by inviting a man along?" Grace asked." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "He couldn’t just come right out with it, could he? No, that would scare her off. He had to be subtle, build up to it. Explain himself. “I love you.” Of course, straight to the point was also an effective strategy." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "Poppy: What makes you think I'm having dinner with you? Jake: Because you can't sit in your room and eat ice cream and chips two nights in a row. You'll get scurvy. You need vitamin C." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Sarah Mayberry
item.description: "I swear there are about a million rocks underneath me," [Dylan] said grouchily. Think of it as therapeutic. Like a shiatsu massage." (Sadie) You obviously have a much better imagination than me," he said." -- Sarah Mayberry

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Winter is coming." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Megan Hart
item.description: "Sometimes grief is a comfort we grant ourselves because it's less terrifying than trying for joy. Nobody wants to admit it. We'd all declare we want to be happy, if we could. So why, then, is pain the one thing we most often hold on to? Why are slights and griefs the memories on which we choose to dwell? Is it because joy doesn't last but grief does?" -- Megan Hart

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Megan Hart
item.description: "Scars are proof we can can survive" -- Megan Hart

item.title: Sayuri_x add a quote by Tim Gunn
item.description: "Make it work" -- Tim Gunn
